# The `LoongArchTargetTransformInfo.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This file implements a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo">TargetTransformInfo</a> analysis pass specific to the <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loongarch">LoongArch</a> target machine. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This file implements a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo">TargetTransformInfo</a> analysis pass specific to the <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loongarch">LoongArch</a> target machine.

It uses the target&#39;s detailed information to provide more precise answers to certain <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa0d69e81725c10fa5407f0bf34462068">TTI</a> queries, while letting the target independent and default <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa0d69e81725c10fa5407f0bf34462068">TTI</a> implementations handle the rest.

<SectionDefinition>

  prototype={<>#define DEBUG&#95;TYPE&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&quot;loongarchtti&quot;</>}>

</SectionDefinition>
